StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertUpdateApplica.onChecklist]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@NWA_ID int ,@NAVMC10468 char(1) ,@MCFAPFIPTAP char(1) ,@ACFNAVMC10469 char(1) ,@OFFICIAL_COLLEGE_TRANSCRIPTS char(1) ,@PREVIOUS_SCHOOL_TRANSCRIPTS char(1) ,@ASVAB char(1) ,@PROOF_OF_DEGREE char(1) ,@LAW_SCHOOL_ACCEPTANCE_LETTER char(1) ,@STATE_BAR_NOTIFICATION char(1) ,@INTENT_TO_TRANSFER_TO_4_YR_COLLEGE char(1) ,@DD_FORM_4 char(1) ,@ANNEX_A char(1) ,@ANNEX_B char(1) ,@DD214 char(1) ,@PREVIOUS_DD4 char(1) ,@DD4_DEP_DISCHARGE char(1) ,@SMCR char(1) ,@DD_FORM_368 char(1) ,@ROUGH_NAV_MC_763_RFA char(1) ,@COPY_OF_EPSQ char(1) ,@SRB char(1) ,@BIRTH_VERIFICATION char(1) ,@SSN_CARD char(1) ,@NAV_MC_538 char(1) ,@DEPENDENCY_STATEMENT char(1) ,@MARRIAGE_LICENSE char(1) ,@NAVMC10418_2 char(1) ,@APPLICANT_BRIEFING char(1) ,@RESTRICTIONS char(1) ,@FRATERNIZATION_STATEMENT char(1) ,@USMC_DRUG_POLICY char(1) ,@MEDICAL_INSURANCE char(1) ,@NAV_MC_10418 char(1) ,@ADDENDUM_PAGE char(1) ,@DRUG_STATEMENT char(1) ,@MINOR_TRAFFIC_ARREST_FORM char(1) ,@NON_TRAFFIC_ARREST_FORM char(1) ,@PFT char(1) ,@PHOTO_PAGE char(1) ,@TATOO_PHOTO char(1) ,@DD785 char(1) ,@BODY_FAT_PHOTO char(1) ,@BODY_FAT_MEASUREMENT char(1) ,@HUNDRED_WORD_STATEMENT char(1) ,@OSO_EVALUATION_NAV_MC_10064 char(1) ,@PIQ char(1) ,@DEAN char(1) ,@PRF1 char(1) ,@PRF2 char(1) ,@EMPLOYER char(1) ,@OTHER1 char(1) ,@OTHER2 char(1) ,@I_AND_I char(1) ,@PRINTS char(1) ,@ROTC char(1) ,@LastEditBy varchar(15))
AS
UPDATE [dbo].[APPLICATION_CHECKLIST] SET [NWA_ID] = @NWA_ID ,[NAVMC10468] = @NAVMC10468 ,[MCFAPFIPTAP] = @MCFAPFIPTAP ,[ACFNAVMC10469] = @ACFNAVMC10469 ,[OFFICIAL_COLLEGE_TRANSCRIPTS] = @OFFICIAL_COLLEGE_TRANSCRIPTS ,[PREVIOUS_SCHOOL_TRANSCRIPTS] = @PREVIOUS_SCHOOL_TRANSCRIPTS ,[ASVAB] = @ASVAB ,[PROOF_OF_DEGREE] = @PROOF_OF_DEGREE ,[LAW_SCHOOL_ACCEPTANCE_LETTER] = @LAW_SCHOOL_ACCEPTANCE_LETTER ,[STATE_BAR_NOTIFICATION] = @STATE_BAR_NOTIFICATION ,[INTENT_TO_TRANSFER_TO_4_YR_COLLEGE] = @INTENT_TO_TRANSFER_TO_4_YR_COLLEGE ,[DD_FORM_4] = @DD_FORM_4 ,[ANNEX_A] = @ANNEX_A ,[ANNEX_B] = @ANNEX_B ,[DD214] = @DD214 ,[PREVIOUS_DD4] = @PREVIOUS_DD4 ,[DD4_DEP_DISCHARGE] = @DD4_DEP_DISCHARGE ,[SMCR] = @SMCR ,[DD_FORM_368] = @DD_FORM_368 ,[ROUGH_NAV_MC_763_RFA] = @ROUGH_NAV_MC_763_RFA ,[COPY_OF_EPSQ] = @COPY_OF_EPSQ ,[SRB] = @SRB ,[BIRTH_VERIFICATION] = @BIRTH_VERIFICATION ,[SSN_CARD] = @SSN_CARD ,[NAV_MC_538] = @NAV_MC_538 ,[DEPENDENCY_STATEMENT] = @DEPENDENCY_STATEMENT ,[MARRIAGE_LICENSE] = @MARRIAGE_LICENSE ,[NAVMC10418_2] = @NAVMC10418_2 ,[APPLICANT_BRIEFING] = @APPLICANT_BRIEFING ,[RESTRICTIONS] = @RESTRICTIONS ,[FRATERNIZATION_STATEMENT] = @FRATERNIZATION_STATEMENT ,[USMC_DRUG_POLICY] = @USMC_DRUG_POLICY ,[MEDICAL_INSURANCE] = @MEDICAL_INSURANCE ,[NAV_MC_10418] = @NAV_MC_10418 ,[ADDENDUM_PAGE] = @ADDENDUM_PAGE ,[DRUG_STATEMENT] = @DRUG_STATEMENT ,[MINOR_TRAFFIC_ARREST_FORM] = @MINOR_TRAFFIC_ARREST_FORM ,[NON_TRAFFIC_ARREST_FORM] = @NON_TRAFFIC_ARREST_FORM ,[PFT] = @PFT ,[PHOTO_PAGE] = @PHOTO_PAGE ,[TATOO_PHOTO] = @TATOO_PHOTO ,[DD785] = @DD785 ,[BODY_FAT_PHOTO] = @BODY_FAT_PHOTO ,[BODY_FAT_MEASUREMENT] = @BODY_FAT_MEASUREMENT ,[HUNDRED_WORD_STATEMENT] = @HUNDRED_WORD_STATEMENT ,[OSO_EVALUATION_NAV_MC_10064] = @OSO_EVALUATION_NAV_MC_10064 ,[PIQ] = @PIQ ,[DEAN] = @DEAN ,[PRF1] = @PRF1 ,[PRF2] = @PRF2 ,[EMPLOYER] = @EMPLOYER ,[OTHER1] = @OTHER1 ,[OTHER2] = @OTHER2 ,[I_AND_I] = @I_AND_I ,[PRINTS] = @PRINTS ,[ROTC] = @ROTC ,[USER_LOGIN] = @LastEditBy ,[UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate() WHERE NWA_ID = @NWA_ID
IF @@ROWCOUNT = 0
INSERT INTO [dbo].[APPLICATION_CHECKLIST] ([NWA_ID] ,[NAVMC10468] ,[MCFAPFIPTAP] ,[ACFNAVMC10469] ,[OFFICIAL_COLLEGE_TRANSCRIPTS] ,[PREVIOUS_SCHOOL_TRANSCRIPTS] ,[ASVAB] ,[PROOF_OF_DEGREE] ,[LAW_SCHOOL_ACCEPTANCE_LETTER] ,[STATE_BAR_NOTIFICATION] ,[INTENT_TO_TRANSFER_TO_4_YR_COLLEGE] ,[DD_FORM_4] ,[ANNEX_A] ,[ANNEX_B] ,[DD214] ,[PREVIOUS_DD4] ,[DD4_DEP_DISCHARGE] ,[SMCR] ,[DD_FORM_368] ,[ROUGH_NAV_MC_763_RFA] ,[COPY_OF_EPSQ] ,[SRB] ,[BIRTH_VERIFICATION] ,[SSN_CARD] ,[NAV_MC_538] ,[DEPENDENCY_STATEMENT] ,[MARRIAGE_LICENSE] ,[NAVMC10418_2] ,[APPLICANT_BRIEFING] ,[RESTRICTIONS] ,[FRATERNIZATION_STATEMENT] ,[USMC_DRUG_POLICY] ,[MEDICAL_INSURANCE] ,[NAV_MC_10418] ,[ADDENDUM_PAGE] ,[DRUG_STATEMENT] ,[MINOR_TRAFFIC_ARREST_FORM] ,[NON_TRAFFIC_ARREST_FORM] ,[PFT] ,[PHOTO_PAGE] ,[TATOO_PHOTO] ,[DD785] ,[BODY_FAT_PHOTO] ,[BODY_FAT_MEASUREMENT] ,[HUNDRED_WORD_STATEMENT] ,[OSO_EVALUATION_NAV_MC_10064] ,[PIQ] ,[DEAN] ,[PRF1] ,[PRF2] ,[EMPLOYER] ,[OTHER1] ,[OTHER2] ,[I_AND_I] ,[PRINTS] ,[ROTC] ,[USER_LOGIN] ,[UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@NWA_ID ,@NAVMC10468 ,@MCFAPFIPTAP ,@ACFNAVMC10469 ,@OFFICIAL_COLLEGE_TRANSCRIPTS ,@PREVIOUS_SCHOOL_TRANSCRIPTS ,@ASVAB ,@PROOF_OF_DEGREE ,@LAW_SCHOOL_ACCEPTANCE_LETTER ,@STATE_BAR_NOTIFICATION ,@INTENT_TO_TRANSFER_TO_4_YR_COLLEGE ,@DD_FORM_4 ,@ANNEX_A ,@ANNEX_B ,@DD214 ,@PREVIOUS_DD4 ,@DD4_DEP_DISCHARGE ,@SMCR ,@DD_FORM_368 ,@ROUGH_NAV_MC_763_RFA ,@COPY_OF_EPSQ ,@SRB ,@BIRTH_VERIFICATION ,@SSN_CARD ,@NAV_MC_538 ,@DEPENDENCY_STATEMENT ,@MARRIAGE_LICENSE ,@NAVMC10418_2 ,@APPLICANT_BRIEFING ,@RESTRICTIONS ,@FRATERNIZATION_STATEMENT ,@USMC_DRUG_POLICY ,@MEDICAL_INSURANCE ,@NAV_MC_10418 ,@ADDENDUM_PAGE ,@DRUG_STATEMENT ,@MINOR_TRAFFIC_ARREST_FORM ,@NON_TRAFFIC_ARREST_FORM ,@PFT ,@PHOTO_PAGE ,@TATOO_PHOTO ,@DD785 ,@BODY_FAT_PHOTO ,@BODY_FAT_MEASUREMENT ,@HUNDRED_WORD_STATEMENT ,@OSO_EVALUATION_NAV_MC_10064 ,@PIQ ,@DEAN ,@PRF1 ,@PRF2 ,@EMPLOYER ,@OTHER1 ,@OTHER2 ,@I_AND_I ,@PRINTS ,@ROTC ,@LastEditBy ,GetDate())
